page.title: 11CHURCHES IN LYNEHAM
page.content: WE WENT TO ST MICHAEL'S CHURCH AND WE SAW A GRAVE _YARD AND WE SAW A STAIN GLASS WINDOW. ALAN ALDERSON 6YRS. ST. MICHAEL'S CHURCH IS NICE, WE WENT ROUND THE OUTSIDE SO THAT WE COULD GET THE SHAPE OF IT IN OUR MINDS ,FIRST WE WENT INTO THE VESTRY TO SEE THE BELLS AND THE CHOIR ROBES THEN WE WENT TO SEE THE FONT WHERE YOU GET CHRISTENED THEN WE SAW THE R.A.F. CHAPEL THEN THE PULPIT. WE SAW THE ALTAR IT IS SPECIAL. REBBECA SIBUN 6YRS. THERE IS ANOTHER CHURCH THAT I GO TO CALLED ST.JOSEPHS R.C I MADE MY FIRST COMMUNION THERE .THE WINDOWS ARE VERY BRIGHT COLOURS YOU WOULD LIKE TO SEE THEM. BYRON HEARD 6YRS.
